mapper.update: update statistics set visit=visit+1 where regdate=to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd')
update statistics set purchase_count = purchase_count+1 where regdate=to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd')
update statistics set funding_apply=funding_apply+1 where regdate=to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd')
update statistics set purchase_price =purchase_price + #{_parameter} where regdate=to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd')
update statistics set purchase_price = purchase_price - #{_parameter} where regdate = to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd')
mapper.select: select regdate, visit, purchase_count, purchase_price, funding_apply from (select rownum,regdate, visit, purchase_count, purchase_price, funding_apply from (select regdate, visit, purchase_count, purchase_price, funding_apply from statistics order by regdate desc)) where rownum <= 8
